pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tests on Properties of Space-Time Covariance Functions // Tests on properties of space-time covariance functions. Tests on symmetry, separability and for assessing different forms of non-separability are available. Moreover tests on some classes of covariance functions, such that the classes of product-sum models, Gneiting models and integrated product models have been provided. It is the companion R package to the paper of Cappello C., De Iaco S. and Posa D. doi:10.1007/s00477-017-1472-2.
